mapper.insert: insert into RECRUITMENT( R_ID ,CM_ID, R_TITLE, R_SAL, R_TIME, R_START_DATE, R_END_DATE, R_RECRUITMENT_VOLUME, R_INFO, R_REGISTRATION_DATE, R_REGISTRATION_STATE, D_ID, IND_ID, E_ID, ET_ID, REC_ID, WA_ID ) values( 'r_' || LPAD(r_seq.NEXTVAL, 5, '0'), #{CM_ID}, #{R_TITLE}, #{R_SAL}, #{R_TIME}, #{R_START_DATE}, #{R_END_DATE}, #{R_RECRUITMENT_VOLUME}, #{R_INFO}, SYSDATE, 'Y', #{D_ID}, #{IND_ID}, #{E_ID}, #{ET_ID}, #{REC_ID}, #{WA_ID} )
mapper.select: select count(app.r_id) applycnt, re.R_ID, re.R_TITLE, re.R_START_DATE, re.R_END_DATE, re.R_REGISTRATION_STATE, re.R_REGISTRATION_DATE from RECRUITMENT re, application app where re.cm_id = 'cm_00001' and R_REGISTRATION_STATE = 'Y' and re.r_id = app.r_id group by re.R_ID, re.R_TITLE, re.R_START_DATE, re.R_END_DATE, re.R_REGISTRATION_STATE, re.R_REGISTRATION_DATE

select R_TITLE, R_SAL, R_TIME, R_START_DATE, R_END_DATE, R_RECRUITMENT_VOLUME, R_INFO, R_REGISTRATION_DATE, R_REGISTRATION_STATE, du.d_name, ind.ind_name, edu.education, emp.et_name, rec.rec_name, wa.wa_name, du.D_ID, ind.IND_ID, edu.E_ID, emp.ET_ID, rec.REC_ID, wa.WA_ID from RECRUITMENT re, duty du, industry ind, education edu, EMPLOYMENT_TYPE emp, WORKING_AREA wa, re_career rec where r_id = #{ R_ID } and re.d_id = du.d_id and re.ind_id = ind.ind_id and re.e_id = edu.e_id and re.et_id = emp.et_id and re.rec_id = rec.rec_id and re.wa_id = wa.wa_id
mapper.update: update RECRUITMENT set R_TITLE = #{R_TITLE}, R_SAL = #{R_SAL}, R_TIME = #{R_TIME}, R_START_DATE = #{R_START_DATE}, R_END_DATE = #{R_END_DATE}, R_RECRUITMENT_VOLUME = #{R_RECRUITMENT_VOLUME}, R_INFO = #{R_INFO}, R_REGISTRATION_DATE = SYSDATE, R_REGISTRATION_STATE = 'Y', D_ID = #{D_ID}, IND_ID = #{IND_ID}, E_ID = #{E_ID}, ET_ID = #{ET_ID}, REC_ID = #{REC_ID}, WA_ID = #{WA_ID} where r_id = #{R_ID}
